moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5 3. e5 c5: French Defense:Advance variation. This is my favourite defense against e4.
moves.4. Bb5+:
Unusual 4th move of white.

Theory: 4.c3 Nc3 5.Nf6 Db6
moves.4... Bd7 5. Bxd7+ Qxd7 6. Ne2: I think it was better the knight on f3. There's no point to put the knight on e2.
moves.6... Nc6 7. Be3 cxd4: I played this move with the point of developing my dark squares bishop.
moves.8. Nxd4 Nxe5:
Here, I won a pawn.

8.Bxc3 was the move, trying to change his bad bishop.
moves.9. Nc3 Bb4 10. Bd2 Nf6 11. a3 Bc5: Better than Ba5, attacking white castle.
moves.12. Be3 Nfg4:
I think this is a good move.

I played this move , because I wanted to still atacking the f2 point, but trying a little trap.

If white tries to defend, the bishop with the queen, you'll see what happens.
moves.13. Qe2 Nxe3 14. Qxe3 Nc6 15. Nce2 e5: Trapping the knight, Black is now a piece ahead
moves.16. O-O-O O-O 17. Qc3 Bxd4 18. Nxd4 Nxd4: Now the plan is to put pressure on the c file.
moves.19. Rhe1 Rac8 20. Qg3 Rxc2+: I dont' know if this is the BEST move in this position, but it will lead to a winning position
moves.21. Kb1 Qf5 22. Ka2 Rxb2+: Now a lit bit of tactics!
moves.23. Kxb2 Qc2+ 24. Ka1 Nb3+: Winning the queen and the game!
moves.25. Qxb3 Qxb3 26. Rdb1: The worst move in the position .
